other_tests.findings: Positive for hazelnut and Stark apple (oropharyngeal itching and throat-ache that receded spontaneously).
other_tests.changes_over_time: At end of treatment, challenges were negative for all foods except hazelnut that elicited throat constriction, cough, and dysphonia.

other_tests.findings: No side effects observed during the treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the end of the treatment, challenges were negative, suggesting successful desensitization.

other_tests.procedure_name: Upper and Lower Gastrointestinal Endoscopy and Biopsies
other_tests.findings: Macroscopically mild hemorrhagic gastritis; histological analysis revealed increased eosinophil density in the lamina propria with occasional eosinophil clustering.
No macroscopic changes; bronchoalveolar lavage showed 8% eosinophils.
Reduced ejection fraction of the left ventricle (LVEF 46%) with diastolic dysfunction.
Late gadolinium enhancement (LGE) changes in both left and right ventricle, indicating irreversible changes with signs of acute ongoing inflammation.
